item.title: Text Mining, Networks and Visualization: Plebiscito Tweets
item.description: Nowadays social media generates a vast amount of raw data (text, images, videos, etc). It is a very interesting challenge to discover techniques to get insights on the content and development of social media data. In addition, as a fundamental component of the analysis, it is important to find ways of communicating the results, i.e.Â data visualization. In this post I want to present a small case study where I analyze Twitter text data.
